summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SunoLegal (NyayAI) website - AI-powered legal assistance platform. Tested both backend APIs and frontend functionality including navigation, chat interface, and waitlist form.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns JSON metadata instead of PDF file
critical_bugs.impact: Document generation feature not working as expected for end users

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Returns success but missing waitlist_id in response when user already exists
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Backend logic working correctly, test expects different response format

ui_bugs.issue: shadcn/ui Select component dropdown options not clickable in automated tests

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, navigation, and CTA buttons
Navigation works across all pages (Home, NyayAI, Documents, Find Lawyer, For Lawyers, About)
NyayAI chat interface displays and responds to user input
Sample questions in chat work correctly
Backend health check returns healthy status
Lawyers API returns lawyer data with filtering
NyayAI chat API provides legal guidance responses
Booking API creates lawyer consultation bookings
Cases API allows case creation and listing
User profile API works for create/update/get operations
Waitlist API accepts form data (backend working)
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Fix document generation endpoint to return actual PDF files instead of JSON metadata. 2. The waitlist dropdown UI components need better testability - consider adding data-value attributes to dropdown options for automated testing.

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (UI loads and navigation works, minor dropdown interaction issue)
